Text: Scream (Tokio Hotel album):  The name "Scream" is the English translation of the name of the first Tokio Hotel album, "Schrei".

Text: Scream (Tokio Hotel album):  The first single released from the album was simply called "Monsoon" - not "Through the Monsoon" (the literal translation of the original, "Durch den Monsun").
